flawed_nl_solution:
Each tree produces 60*0.5=<<60*0.5=30>>30 more lemons than normal
So they each produce 60+30=<<60+30=90>>90 lemons
He has 50*30=<<50*30=1500>>1500 trees
So every year he produces 1500*90=<<1500*90=135000>>135000 lemons
That means he produces 135000*5=<<135000*5=670500>>670500
#### 670500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 675000, not 670500. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
